Adapter.Name: ScheduledInvoicePDFAdapter
Adapter.Description: Adapter responsible for submitting PDFgeneration requests to the reporting server for On-Demand invoices

Adapter.Name: BeginGenerateSampleInvoices
Adapter.Description: MetraTech standard adapter, which triggers generation of sample invoices, so that invoice correctness could be validated before real production invoices are run

item.DisplayName: Déclenche la création d'exemples de factures
item.Description: L'adaptateur MetraTech standard déclenche la création d'exemples de factures afin de valider l'exactitude des factures avant la publication des factures de production réelles

item.DisplayName: [IT] Triggers Sample Invoices Generation
item.Description:

MetraTech standard adapter, which triggers generation of sample invoices, so that invoice correctness could be validated before real production invoices are run

item.DisplayName: Dispara a geração de faturas de exemplo
item.Description: Adaptador padrão MetraTech, o que desencadeia geração de faturas de amostra, de modo que correção da fatura pode ser validado antes faturas reais de produção são executados

Adapter.Name: CompleteGenerateSampleInvoices
Adapter.DisplayName: Wait for all sample invoices to finish
Adapter.Description: MetraTech standard adapter, which waits for reporting provider (Crystal APS in our case) to finish running invoices

item.DisplayName: Attendez que tous les exemples de factures soient créés
item.Description: L'adaptateur MetraTech standard attend que le générateur de rapports (ici Crystal APS) finisse la création des factures
